name: Niranjan Akella
bio: AI engineer with a passion for science and deep expertise in deploying LLMs, diffusion, and vision models at scale.

contributions.title: Key Quantified Benefits with Qdrant's 1.5-bit Binary Quantization:
Sub 10ms RAG on CPU: 1.5bit Quantisation with Qdrant and fastRTC for Real-Time AI Agents

name: Tarun Jain
bio: Google Developer Expert in AI and two-time Google Summer of Code contributor (Red Hen Lab and caMicroscope). Creates educational AI content on YouTube and regularly speaks at tech events.

contributions.title: Search Matters: Engineering Search System that works
contributions.description: FastEmbed as the embeddings and used a Hybrid search and MMR snippet using Qdrant as the Vector store.

contributions.title: Long Term Memory for Gemini.
contributions.description: Used FastEmbed as the embeddings from LangChain and used Qdrant Store vector config via Mem0.

contributions.title: Local Agentic RAG using Gemma and Qdrant
Routing in function calling using LangGraph, Gemma, and Qdrant
contributions.description: Gemma doesn’t support native function calling, so he showed an alternative that can be used via an Agentic RAG use case.

contributions.title: Implement Long-term memory to Large Language models that works
contributions.description: Add personalised context to the LLM using FastEmbed and Qdrant via Mem0 and monitor the application using Weave by Wandb

contributions.title: Custom Function Calling Router for Gemma-3
contributions.description: Implement and monitor a function-calling workflow using LangGraph, Google GenAI, Qdrant, and Opik.

contributions.title: Build and Evaluate an Agentic RAG || How Uber is using AI Agents?
contributions.description: In this build, he recreated a prototype inspired by Uber’s Enhanced Agentic-RAG: What If Chatbots Could Deliver Near-Human Precision?
